item.title: SimpleDiagrams
item.description: SimpleDiagrams is an Adobe AIR desktop application for diagramming. It's useful for simple illustrations that you might create on a whiteboard or in a tool like OmniGraffle. There's a free version, which lets you use built in stencil libraries and export to PNG. The paid version gets rid of upgrade reminders, allows you to export to Basecamp, import libraries, and install on multiple machines. http://www.simplediagrams.com/home
